definitions.definition: To join into a single mass or whole .
examples: The droplets coalesced into a puddle.

definitions.definition: To form from different pieces or elements .
examples: The puddle coalesced from the droplets as they ran together.
labels: of a whole or a unit
definitions.label_groups: of a whole or a unit

definitions.definition: To bond pieces of metal into a continuous whole by liquefying parts of each piece, bringing the liquids into contact, and allowing the combined liquid to solidify.
To convert a null value to a defined value .

main_definition: ( of separate elements ) To join into a single mass or whole .
secondary_definitions: ( of a whole or a unit ) To form from different pieces or elements .
( engineering ) To bond pieces of metal into a continuous whole by liquefying parts of each piece, bringing the liquids into contact, and allowing the combined liquid to solidify.
( of separate groups or persons ) To merge , to intermingle freely.
( databases , SQL ) To convert a null value to a defined value .
